# Project Milestone 1: Project Proposal
Create a GitHub repository with all team members as collaborators.

Make sure to add access for the instructor(s).

1. Create a README.md file for the repository and include the following:
    a. Project title (must be something representing your project)
    b. Team #
    c. Team/Product Name
    d. Team members: list the name, git username, and email for each member.
    e. Day/Time/TimeZone for the scheduled team weekly meeting (30 minutes via Zoom)
    f. Vision statement: what would you tell potential customers?
    g. Motivation: why are you working on this project?
    h. Risks to project completion, possibly including:
        i. new language or working environment
        ii. no prior experience working with these team members
        iii. lack of some needed resources
    i. Mitigation Strategy for above risks
    j. Development method: scrum, kanban, waterfall: with specifics!
    k. Project Tracking Software link (Trello is most common)
   
2. Each team member must submit the following information in the textbox for Project Milestone 1:
    a. Team #, Team Name
    b. Student Name
    c. GitHub username
    d. GitHub Project Repository link
    e. Project Tracking Software link
